body_html:
I've solved it with:

sudo touch /etc/ld.so.conf.d/cuda.conf
sudo nano /etc/ld.so.conf.d/cuda.conf

After edit the file :
/usr/local/cuda/lib64

Save the changes :
sudo ldconfig

CF : https://stackoverflow.com/questions/13428910/how-to-set-the-environmental-variable-ld-library-path-in-linux.

body:
I've solved it with:
```
sudo touch /etc/ld.so.conf.d/cuda.conf
sudo nano /etc/ld.so.conf.d/cuda.conf
```
After edit the file :
`/usr/local/cuda/lib64`

Save the changes :
`sudo ldconfig`

CF : https://stackoverflow.com/questions/13428910/how-to-set-the-environmental-variable-ld-library-path-in-linux.
